name: Seagle Air FTO s.r.o.
about: Seagle Air - FTO, located at Trenčín Airport in Slovakia, is a professionally accredited flight training organization holding the FTO SK/02 certificate. We offer comprehensive flight training programs from the initial private pilot license (PPL) to the level of a professional pilot, including commercial pilot license (CPL), instrument rating (IR), and multi-engine pilot (MEP) certifications. Our training adheres to the strict standards of JAR-FCL 1, supervised by experienced instructors from renowned global air operators. Our fleet consists of modern, safety-compliant Diamond Aircraft. With a commitment to excellence and safety, Seagle Air - FTO is dedicated to transforming aspiring aviators into skilled aviation professionals.
services:
["Private Pilot License PPL(A)
Commercial Pilot License CPL(A)
ATPL(A) Transport Pilot Theory
Class qualification SEP(L)
Class qualification MEP(L)
Qualification for night flights
Instrument qualification IR(A) SE
Instrument qualification IR(A) ME
Extension of the IR(A) SE qualification by IR(A) ME
FI(A) Instructor Qualification
CRI(A) SE/ME Instructor Qualification
PPL(A) license for LAPL(A) license holder
Advanced UPRT"]
